mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_cd_grp.select */ SELECT cd_grp /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */ ,cd_grp_nm /* cd_grp_nm 코드_그룹_명 character varying(100) */ ,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tc_cd_grp WHERE 1 = 1 AND cd_grp = #{cdGrp} /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_cd_grp.insert */ INSERT INTO tc_cd_grp ( cd_grp /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */
,cd_grp_nm /* cd_grp_nm 코드_그룹_명 character varying(100) */
,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{cdGrp} /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */
,#{cdGrpNm} /* cd_grp_nm 코드_그룹_명 character varying(100) */
,#{useYn} /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_cd_grp.update */ UPDATE tc_cd_grp
,cd_grp_nm = #{cdGrpNm} /* cd_grp_nm 코드_그룹_명 character varying(100) */
,use_yn = #{useYn} /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND cd_grp = #{cdGrp} /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */
